description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
reduce accuracy.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
reduce accuracy.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Fires a lump of ink to
damage and cut accuracy.

Fires a lump of ink to
damage and cut accuracy.
description.firered-leafgreen:

the foe’s face or

lower accuracy.
description.diamond-pearl:

spraying ink in the
foe’s face or eyes.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.
